home.reconnectDescription: Your Instagram session has expired. To continue creating automations, please reconnect your Instagram account.
home.noBusinessAccountDescription: No Instagram Business or Creator account has been detected. Please reconnect and make sure to select a valid account during the process.
home.connectInstagramDescription: To create automations, you need to link your Instagram account.
home.automationDialogParagraph1: To use automation features, you need to link your Professional Instagram.
home.automationDialogParagraph2: It is mandatory to have a Facebook account associated with your Instagram account.
home.automationDialogParagraph3: If you created your Instagram account without Facebook, you must first create a Facebook account and link it to your Instagram.
home.linkHowToLinkFacebookInstagram: How to link your Facebook account to Instagram
home.automationDialogParagraph4: You can link your account by logging into your Facebook account from Meta Business:
home.linkMetaBusiness: Access Meta Business to link accounts
home.automationInfoInstagramType: An Instagram account of type Business or Creator 📱
home.automationInfoFacebookPage: That is linked to a Facebook Page (not just a personal profile) 📄
home.automationInfoAdminPermissions: Administrator permissions on the linked Facebook Page
home.automationInfoPermissions: Grant all permissions requested during the connection process
home.tokenExpiredWarning: If your token is expired or your account is not properly linked, you will not be able to create reels or stories.

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Log in to your account
login.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Check your email to confirm your account.
login.emailConfirmed: Email confirmed! You can now log in.
login.emailConfirmationError: Error confirming email. Please register again.
login.termsText: By logging in, you agree to our

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Start automating your replies
register.errorRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

forgotPassword.title: Reset password
forgotPassword.sentMessagePart2: exists, we have sent you an email with instructions.

createMediaModal.descriptionReel: Add a new reel to set up automatic replies
createMediaModal.descriptionStory: Add a new story to set up automatic replies
createMediaModal.draftModeInfo: Draft mode allows you to prepare the automation (replies, keywords) before publishing the {mediaType}. Once you publish your {mediaType} on Instagram, add the URL or select the {mediaType} and Draft mode will be automatically disabled.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm deletion
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this {mediaType}? This action cannot be undone.

globalStatsModal.subtitle: Breakdown by {interval} ({mediaType})
globalStatsModal.legendHint: Click a day to highlight it

instagramReelsList.retryMessage: Please try again later or add the reel manually.
instagramReelsList.errorAccountInfo: Could not get information from your Instagram account.
instagramReelsList.checkConnection: Have you connected your Instagram account?

instagramConnect.errorConfig: Instagram setup incomplete. Contact the administrator.
instagramConnect.reconnectPrompt: If you are having problems with your Instagram account, try reconnecting it.
instagramConnect.connectPrompt: You need to connect your Instagram account to create automations.

dashboard.manageDesc: Manage your reels and automations from this dashboard
dashboard.yourAutomationsDesc: Manage your automatic replies for reels and stories

reels.title: Reels
reels.description: List of reels configured for automatic replies
reels.noReels: You don't have any configured reels

stories.title: Stories
stories.description: List of stories configured for automatic replies
stories.noStories: You don't have any configured stories

stats.reelsGlobalDesc: Summary of automatic replies sent across all Reel automations.
stats.storiesGlobalDesc: Summary of automatic replies sent across all Story automations.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs

captionGenerator.title: Caption Generator
captionGenerator.description: Upload a video and automatically generate captions for Instagram and YouTube.
captionGenerator.uploadDone: Video uploaded! Ready to generate caption.
captionGenerator.uploadExplanation: We will analyze the video's transcription, review your other reels, and then generate the best caption for you.
captionGenerator.linkInputPlaceholder: This link will appear in your caption
captionGenerator.historyDescription: Access all your previously generated captions.
captionGenerator.noHistory: You haven't generated any captions yet.
captionGenerator.noVoiceMessage: The video appears to be musical-only and doesn't contain speech, so no captions were generated.
captionGenerator.descriptionPlaceholder: I teach you how to cook! 🍳
captionGenerator.introExplanation: Create a single page with all your links so your audience on your social networks can easily access your resources and increase your leads.

landing.slugExplanation: This will be your page address, e.g.: username.creator0x.com
landing.configuratorDescription: 🚀 Choose your subdomain and customize your page. You can also connect your own domain with a Medium plan. ✨
landing.introExplanation: Create a single page with all your links so your audience on your social networks can easily access your resources and increase your leads.

editor.title: Edit your Landing Page
editor.description: Create sections to organize your links. Each section can contain multiple links that you can reorder by dragging and dropping, or move between sections using the corresponding button.
editor.moveItemNotification: To move items between sections, use the move button (⇄) in the item. Drag and drop only works within the same section.

social.title: Social Media
social.description: Add and organize your social media links. Enable the ones you want to display on your landing page and reorder them by dragging and dropping.

customDomains.title: Custom Domain
customDomains.confirmRemoveDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the domain "{domain}"? This action cannot be undone.
customDomains.confirmRemoveWarning: ⚠️ This will permanently remove the domain and its SSL certificate from our servers.
customDomains.domainAddedSuccess: Domain added successfully. Configure DNS to continue.
customDomains.dnsVerifiedSuccess: DNS verified successfully. Generating SSL certificate...
customDomains.retrySuccess: Retry initiated. The process may take a few minutes.
customDomains.retryInProgress: A retry is already in progress for this domain.
customDomains.retryHint: 💡 You can use the "Retry" button to attempt SSL configuration again.
customDomains.noChangesDetected: No changes detected. The domain is still processing.

dnsInstructions.title: Required DNS configuration:
dnsInstructions.description: For your domain to work correctly, you need to configure these DNS records with your provider:
dnsInstructions.step2: Configure the A record for www (optional but recommended):
dnsInstructions.step3: Keep the TXT record for verification:
dnsInstructions.note: Note: DNS changes may take up to 48 hours to propagate completely.
dnsInstructions.verificationNote: The TXT record is necessary to verify that you own the domain.
dnsInstructions.instruction1: Go to your domain provider's control panel
dnsInstructions.instruction2: Look for the "DNS" or "DNS Zone" section
dnsInstructions.instruction3: Add the A records shown above
dnsInstructions.instruction4: Add the TXT record for verification
dnsInstructions.domainOwnershipWarning: Make sure you own the domain and have access to its DNS configuration

errors.dnsVerificationFailed: Could not verify {type} record. This is normal - DNS propagation can take up to 48 hours. Please wait and try again later.
errors.dnsQueryError: Error querying DNS. Please check your configuration and try again.
errors.dnsToolsUnavailable: DNS verification temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few minutes.
errors.dnsRecordsNotFound: DNS records not found. Please check that you have added the required DNS records and wait for propagation (up to 48 hours).
errors.dnsTimeout: DNS query timed out. Please try again later.
errors.domainAlreadyExists: This domain is already being used by another user.
errors.invalidDomain: The domain format is not valid.
errors.sslGenerationFailed: Failed to generate SSL certificate. You can retry.
errors.sslTimeout: SSL process took longer than expected. You can retry.
errors.sslRateLimit: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait before retrying.
errors.sslValidationFailed: Domain validation failed. Check DNS configuration.
errors.invalidRetryState: This domain cannot be retried in its current state.
errors.vpsConnectionFailed: Cannot connect to VPS server. Please try again later.
errors.sslProcessBusy: SSL generation is already in progress. Please wait a moment and try again.

customDomains.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the domain {domain}? This action cannot be undone.
customDomains.confirmDeleteWarningMessage: ⚠️ This will permanently remove the domain and its SSL certificate from our servers.

styleCustomization.description: Change colors, fonts and borders of your landing

themeSelector.title: Select Theme
themeSelector.description: Choose the perfect style for your landing

upload.title: Upload Avatar
upload.description: Upload a specific avatar for this landing page that will be shown publicly.

selectTheme.title: Select your theme
selectTheme.description: Choose the style that best represents your personality

dark.description: Total black background, black links with white borders

light.description: Clean light theme with minimalist design

neon-cyber.description: Cyberpunk style with neons and glowing effects

sunset-dream.description: Warm sunset colors with elegant typography

forest-zen.description: Minimalist nature with relaxing green tones

royal-luxury.description: Golden elegance with classic serif typography

landingInfoEditor.shortcuts: Ctrl+Enter to save, Esc to cancel

avatarDisplaySelector.title: Avatar Configuration
avatarDisplaySelector.description: Choose whether to show your profile picture or just the name

withAvatar.title: With Avatar
withAvatar.description: Show your profile picture above the name

nameOnly.title: Name Only
nameOnly.description: Show only the name without profile picture

effectsSelector.title: Visual Effects
effectsSelector.description: Enable or disable special effects for your landing page

badge.title: Verification Badge
badge.description: Shows a blue verified badge next to the name

typewriter.title: Typewriter Effect
typewriter.description: The description appears as if being typed in real time

fontFamily.title: Font Type
fontFamily.previewDescription: This is the description of my landing page with the selected font.

landingAvatarUpload.imageTooLarge: The image cannot be larger than 10MB
